body:
#1023 Balloon tip text not visible

http://packages.ubuntu.com/raring/mumble
Are you using that one?
mumble (1.2.3-349-g315b5f5-2.2ubuntu1)

#1023 Balloon tip text not visible

Sorry, my verson is not that one from the repository.
I'm using mumble 1.2.4-1~ppa2~raring1.

#1023 Balloon tip text not visible

I'm now using Mumble 1.2.4 under Fedora Xfce. Same problem here. 
I'm using the Xfce theme "Xfce-darkness". Perhaps this is the root cause for the invisible text.
